entry.data:
SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

RAIN
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS AROUND 40
LOWS 15 TO 20

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
COOLER
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 20

MOSTLY CLEAR
COLD WITH LOWS 5 TO 10 ABOVE

entry.em: MARTIN LUTHER KING JR DAY AND MONDAY NIGHT
entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS AROUND 20
LOWS 5 TO 10 ABOVE
